episodes.title: Life in Gothard's IBLP - w/Christy Lynne Wood
episodes.description:
This evening I'm talking to Christy Lynne Wood - a former member of Bill Gothard's Institute in Basic Life Principles - made famous by the Dugger family, stars of the TLC show "19 Kids and Counting".

Christy shares her insight on the theology, beliefs, and practices of this Fundamentalist Christian group and her journey of "deconstructing" Christianity. 

Subscribe to Christy's "Religious Rebels Podcast" at:  https://www.youtube.com/@ChristyLynneWood

Visit Christy's website: https://christylynnewood.com/ 

Buy me a coffee to help make this channel better and continue to educate people on new religious movements:  https://www.buymeacoffee.com/devotiondemystified
